page.title: 08Trade in Woburn
page.content:
There is quite a variety of shops in Woburn consisting of a butcher and greengrocer, a post office, some art galleries, a reject china shop, a few boutiques, a shoe shop, a book shop and a number of antique shops.
Woburn really caters for tourists and not its own residents because as you will see there are many expensive boutiques and craft shops. Most of these shops are open on Sunday for the visitors who come to see the Abbey. There are only two small food shops to provide for the villagers who have to go elsewhere for most of their needs.
The shops in Woburn are very nice and the selection is very good but most of the things are very expensive.
